attributes.action: Making school's regconise bullying and stopping it now
attributes.additional_details:
I have had enough of school's saying bullying does not happen. It does and it is ruining children's lifes.
Bully's should be disiplined and school's to regconise that bully's are in they school's.

 I want the government to make school's regconise bullying and to disipline the bully's, so they stop.

The following ways I suggest are:

First time: Warned and put on report
Second time: Detention
Third time: Suspened
Fourth time: Expelled

This is the only way to stop the bullying now.

If you have been affected by bullying please sign and make it stop now.
